attributes.action: Demand the right to swear at football matches.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We Demand the right to swear at football matches and for every football club to respect this.
Being fully aware of sectarianism and racism - it is absolutely unacceptable for these issues to be used to censor the prolific, colourfull and emotional use of swear words - which given the ability of the British Football teams internationally and nationally - it is an essential part of the football fans enjoyment of the rollercoaster, that is football.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
